enum: Extent to which global citizenship education and education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in curricula [4.7.1,12.8.1,13.3.1]
Extent to which global citizenship education and education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in national education policies [4.7.1,12.8.1,13.3.1]
Extent to which global citizenship education and education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in student assessment [4.7.1,12.8.1,13.3.1]

title:
Grado en que i) la educación para la ciudadanía mundial y ii) la educación para el desarrollo sostenible se incorporan en a) las políticas nacionales de educación, b) los planes de estudio, 
c) la formación del profesorado y d) la evaluación de los estudiantes
